colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES SA BDAG GTER BUM DGOS 'DOD RE BA SKONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BLO MIG RGYAS PA DGE SLONG WANG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG RTZE RAM PA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL RTZON GRUS DANG LDAN PA DGE TSUL THO YON BLO BZANG SBYIN BA DANG DGE TSUL LHUN GRUB SOGS SA BDAG GI GTER BUM 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, LHO 'KHYAMS PA SKU SKYES AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SLOB MA'I SHES RAB DANG @004A *, ,LDAN PA THO YON BLO BZANG SHES RAB PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PA'O,, ,,)
